attributes.action: Abolish the proposed tax on pension funds of 70% of the net value on death after Inheritance TAx
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can a SIPP be classed as tax avoidance when 40% inh. tax is charged on the death.  The compulsory purchase of an annuity at age 75 is disgraceful.  people should be allowed toconduct their own affairs and not be forced to buy an annuity which generates huge profits to insurance companies

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish the proposed tax on pension funds of 70% of the net value on death after Inheritance TAx."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
